titles.title: Of inquiry requesting the President and directing the Attorney General to transmit, respectively, certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to violent extremism against pregnancy centers.

Of inquiry requesting the President and directing the Attorney General to transmit, respectively, certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to violent extremism against pregnancy centers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution requests the President, and directs the Department of Justice, to transmit to the House of Representatives all correspondence and other communications in their possession respectively related to attacks on certain crisis pregnancy centers or any religious organization following the leak of a Supreme Court opinion concerning the right to abortion.
